name: DUST 514 Free-to-Play
description:
DUST 514® brings intense infantry combat, large scale warfare and rich character advancement to PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system in a system exclusive free-to-play persistent shooter set in, and integrated with, the massive universe of EVE Online. Wage war in the next generation of first person shooters, where your next victory could prove the crushing blow to a galactic empire of thousands of online gamers.

HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Players 2-32
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.


Additional terms and conditions may apply. See the DUST 514® End-User License Agreement (http://dust514.com/eula) and Terms of Use (http://dust514.com/terms-of-use) for more details.
PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
